Author: Throwaway413vander
Text: I'm so sorry, Ed's really suck with how self critical they can make you, I'm wishing for better days for you. I'm sure you're boyfriend wasnt trying to minimize your problems, it's just a lot of guys are Ill equipped at handling emotional support

Author: little_tiny_pumpkin
Text: Aww hun, that's the worst. Pudge days and how bf's think we're overreacting or delusional.  Sending hugs; wrap up in a massive oversized sweater and hide from the world until it all passes. ðŸ’•
